title: Paediatrics & Paediatric Surgery in India
intro: Specialized care for children in India with expert pediatricians, pediatric surgeons, and child-friendly hospitals. Panacea Medcare connects families to leading pediatric centers for comprehensive children's healthcare.

cardiac.title: Paediatric Cardiac Surgery
cardiac.description: Expert pediatric cardiac surgery in India for congenital heart defects with excellent outcomes, specialized pediatric cardiac ICUs, and compassionate care for children.

oncology.title: Paediatric Oncology & BMT
oncology.description: Comprehensive pediatric cancer treatment and bone marrow transplantation in India with specialized pediatric oncology teams and dedicated care for children.

nicu.title: Neonatal Intensive Care (NICU)
nicu.description: Advanced NICU facilities in India for premature and critically ill newborns with experienced neonatologists and state-of-the-art life support systems.

congenital.title: Congenital Defect Correction
congenital.description: Expert correction of congenital defects in children including cleft lip/palate, congenital heart defects, and other birth anomalies with multidisciplinary teams.

neurology.title: Paediatric Neurology & Neurosurgery
neurology.description: Specialized pediatric neurology and neurosurgery in India for brain tumors, epilepsy, spina bifida, and other neurological conditions in children.

growth.title: Growth & Development Disorders
growth.description: Comprehensive management of growth and development disorders in children including growth hormone therapy, developmental delays, and endocrine disorders.
